alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 12:35AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 115 AM MST... At 1234 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles east of Roosevelt to 9 miles southeast of Tonto National Monument to 6 miles northwest of Top-Of-The-World. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Top Of The World, Cutter, Central Heights-Midland City, Hilltop, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool, Sawmill, Inspiration, and Roosevelt Estates. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 231 and 284. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 266. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 157 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin
